segments.text: Comfort Inn , may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m looking for a hotel near the convention center .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You ’ re in luck ! We ’ re just a two-minute drive from there . Would you like to make a reservation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not just yet . I have one or two questions . How much for a single ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: During the peak season , a single room goes for 50 dollars on a night . But we ’ Ve got a Single Super Saver Special going on right now – only $ 30 a night . And we ’ Ve also extended our checkout time 00 in
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s a good deal . Since this is a working trip , I wonder if you have meeting rooms where I can get together with some clients .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we have five meeting rooms , of various sizes . We can accommodate large meetings and small , informal gatherings as well . Of course , if you have many small meeting , you might consider checking
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds great . Do you accept checks ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m sorry , sir , we don ’ t . But we do accept all major credit cards .
segments.speaker: S1
